Context: The Human Resources Professional Association (HRPA) held its Student Case Competition in March 2023. A team of five HR postgraduate students from George Brown College finished third out of 18 teams in Ontario and first among Toronto colleges and universities. The team members are Melissa Burton, Christina Theocharidis, Claire Kearns, Melanie Facchini, and Aaron Kuo. Their coach is Professor Jennifer Van Amerom. The academic director at George Brown's Centre for Business, Elizabeth Speers, congratulated the team on their achievement. The winning students are celebrated within the college community. For more information about programs offered by the college, visit the School of Human Resources page. Contact details: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca, Social Media Hub. Note: Information on this website is subject to change without notice.
